thread.title: Tracy Luscombe
thread.title_full: Omni Financial reviewed by Tracy Luscombe

author: Tracy Luscombe
title: Tracy Luscombe
text: My husband and I were years behind in taxes. My husband has been self employed for years and with everyday life things going on we honestly got behind in paying in quarterly and it snowballed from there ending us in over 400,000 dollars in debt to the IRS with the saving grace of Richard Monsalve we able to settle our debt for 100.00. I know it doesn't seem possible but it truly is, I was skeptical at first but with our hard work as a team it really was possible. I would recommend this team to anyone. The stress of that burden has been resolved.
